title: *Renovated Somerville/Highland Ave Studio- Available Sept 1st!*
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 190045482', 'Rent: $2,175 / Month', 'Beds: 0', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Only', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Somerville/Prospect Hill studio on Highland Ave close to Winter Hill, Davis Square, Harvard University, T Access, Bus Routes, shopping, dining and much more!', 'Unit features hardwood floors, renovated kitchen, updated bath, laundry on site & great natural sunlight.', 'CAT OK**', 'Heat & hot water included.', 'Call or email Jenna for more details!', '978-504-1490', 'Transportation', 'Bus: 87 Somerville Ave @', 'Loring St (0.36 mi)', 'Bus: 85 Avon St @ Central St (0.15 mi)', 'Bus: 88 Highland Ave @', 'Trull Ln (0.04 mi)', 'Bus: 80 Medford St @ Thurston St (0.26 mi)', 'Bus: 101 Broadway @ Thurston St (0.53 mi)', 'Bus: 89 Broadway opp Main St (0.53 mi)', 'FEATURES', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry in Building', 'On-Site Super', 'Jenna DeLuca of Benjamin Apartments & Cityside Homes', 'Real Estate Professional & Rental Manager', '978-504-1490', "Search Boston's largest selection of apartments at <URL>", 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
